rows.label: qev035605_MSG0001
rows.name:
You would side with these Cavern Clan scum,
Earth alien? With Ganglion?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035605_MSG0003
rows.name:
Were I not wounded, I would chase them from here
myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035605_MSG0002
rows.name:
They sold their souls to Ganglion.
They are not to be trusted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035605_MSG0005
rows.name: She does not lie. I can tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035605_MSG0006
rows.name:
I care not what they say. I will not forgive those who
killed my clansmen. Not while I draw breath.[ST:wait ]
